name: HeightAnimation
description: HeightAnimation is a helper component to animate from 0 to height:auto powered by CSS.

props.name: open
props.doc: Set to `true` on second re-render when the view should animate from 0px to auto. Defaults to `true`.

props.name: animate
props.doc: Set to `false` to omit the animation. Defaults to `true`.

props.name: keepInDOM
props.doc: Set to `true` ensure the nested children content will be kept in the DOM. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: compensateForGap
props.doc: To compensate for CSS gap between the rows, so animation does not jump during the animation. Provide a CSS unit or `auto`. Defaults to `null`.

props.name: showOverflow
props.doc: Set to `true` to omit the usage of "overflow: hidden;". Defaults to `false`.

props.name: duration
props.doc: Custom duration of the animation in milliseconds. Defaults to `400ms`.

props.name: delay
props.doc: Custom delay of the animation in milliseconds. Defaults to `0ms`.

props.name: element
props.doc: Custom HTML element for the component. Defaults to `div` HTML Element.

props.name: innerRef
props.doc: Send along a custom React Ref.

events.name: onOpen
events.doc: Is called when fully opened or closed. Returns `true` or `false` depending on the state.

events.name: onAnimationStart
events.doc: Is called when animation has started. The first parameter is a string. Depending on the state, the value can be `opening`, `closing` or `adjusting`.

events.name: onAnimationEnd
events.doc: Is called when animation is done and the full height is reached. The first parameter is a string. Depending on the state, the value can be `opened`, `closed` or `adjusted`.

events.name: onInit
events.doc: Is called once before mounting the component (useLayoutEffect). Returns the instance of the internal animation class.
